          <title>
            <string language="fr">recherche de mot : mots relatifs à la terre</string>
            <string language="en">Wordsearch: earthword</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wordsearch: earthword</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Wordsearch: earthword</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Wordsearch: earthword</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Wordsearch: earthword</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Wordsearch: earthword</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Seconde sur deux illustrations qui montre une recherche de mot contenant sept mots concernant la Terre. Cette  illustration montre les réponses à la recherche de mot . L'autre  illustration montre le wordsearch inachevé.</string>
            <string language="en">Second of two illustrations that show a wordsearch containing seven words relating to the Earth. This illustration shows the answers to the wordsearch. The other illustration shows the uncompleted wordsearch.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">Réponses</string>
            <string language="en">Answers</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="fr">continent</string>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

            <string language="en">crust</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">igneous</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

            <string language="en">mantle</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">An zweiter Stelle von zwei Abbildungen, die ein 
wordsearch zeigen, das sieben Wörter in bezug auf die Masse enthält.
Diese Abbildung zeigt die Antworten zum wordsearch. Die 
andere Abbildung zeigt das unvollständige wordsearch.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Em segundo de duas ilustrações que mostram um 
wordsearch que contem sete palavras que se relacionam à terra. 
Esta ilustração mostra as respostas ao wordsearch. A 
outra ilustração mostra o wordsearch uncompleted.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In secondo luogo di due illustrazioni che mostrano
un wordsearch che contiene sette parole per quanto riguarda la terra. 
Questa illustrazione mostra le risposte al wordsearch. 
L'altra illustrazione mostra il wordsearch incompiuto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δεύτερη δύο απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν ένα 
wordsearch που περιέχει επτά λέξεις σχετικά με τη γη. 
Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τις απαντήσεις στο 
wordsearch. Η άλλη απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ασυμπλήρωτο 
wordsearch.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En segundo lugar de dos ilustraciones que 
muestran un wordsearch que contiene siete palabras referente a la 
tierra. Esta ilustración muestra las respuestas al wordsearch. 
La otra ilustración muestra el wordsearch inacabado.</string>
          </description>
